verbs.description: [ARG0: red wings] [V: get] [ARG1: first home win 4 - 2 over stars] detroit ap anthony mantha had a goal called back before scoring anyway and the detroit red wings won at home for the first time this season with a 4 - 2 victory over the dallas stars on sunday justin abdelkader tyler bertuzzi dallas detroit red wings jonathan ericsson jonathan bernier dylan larkin detroit little caesars arena anthony mantha dal red wings
